fullName.jp: ファリス・シェルヴィッツ

description.jp: バッツたちが忍びこみ のちに協力を得た海賊船の頭領。常に男装し 素性も明らかではなかったが 冒険を通してタイクーン王家の第一王女でありレナの姉であることが判明。亡くした家族や 仲間のため共に苦難を乗り越えていく。
description.gl: A captain of a pirate ship who decides to help the very people that try to commandeer it. Raised as a boy and shrouded in mystery, she discovers she is the princess of Tycoon and the elder sister of Lenna on her journey with Bartz's party. Her friends and the memories of her family are what drive her to push on.

jp.text: 女だからってバカにすんなよ！
もうこれ以上……\n命が失われるのを見たくない……
海ぞくのおれが\n本当はお姫様かい\n……じょうだんきついよ！
サリサ……おれの本当の名前……

gl.text: Make fun of me for really being a woman and I'll shiver your timbers but good!
I won't stand by while more lives are lost!
A buccaneer like me、 really a prince—er、 princess? 'Tis a bit much、 that!
A father、 huh...wonder what that's like.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_ファリス
name.jp: コールアビリティ_ファリス

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Open Fire (C)] 
• Stolen BRV can overflow up to 120% Max BRV
• Debuffs duration +2
• All targets: removes all buffs
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Open Fire (C):
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Poison, ATK Down III, DEF Down III, MAX BRV Down I duration +2
 • Removes all buffs from all targets
rank_up_desc.jp:
「砲撃【C】」使用時
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの120％分
・「毒」「攻撃力大ダウン」
　「防御力大ダウン」「最大BRV小ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長
・対象の強化効果を全て解除

name.en: Spell Blade: Sword Dance (C) Rank Up
name.gl: LDコールアビリティ_ファリス
name.jp: LDコールアビリティ_ファリス

rank_up_desc.en:
When using [Spell Blade: Sword Dance (C)] 
• 2-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
　+ Increases own BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
　+ 4-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
　+ Increases own BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
　+ 4-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 60%
• Inflicted debuffs duration +2
rank_up_desc.gl:
When using Spellblade Sword Dance (C):
 • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind  melee BRV  attack + HP  attack delivered 2 times becomes:
   • 2-hit Thunder Water Wind  melee BRV  attack + HP  attack
   • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
   • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind  melee BRV  attack + HP  attack
   • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt
   • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind  melee BRV  attack + HP  attack
   • Moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
   • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
   • Enchanting Dance, silver-framed Poison, MAX BRV Down I, ATK Down III, DEF Down III duration +2
rank_up_desc.jp:
「魔法剣つるぎのまい【C】」使用時
・4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行うが
　2HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えた合計HPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　に変化し合計BRV威力も中アップ
・奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
　上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
・「魅了の舞」銀フレーム付き弱体効果「毒」「最大BRV小ダウン」
　「攻撃力大ダウン」「防御力大ダウン」の2ACTION期間延長

desc.en:
6-HIT Thunder Water Wind AoE ranged BRV attack + AoE HP attack
Increases BRV damage dealt by 60% when attacking single target
Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking debuffed targets
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals split HP damage between all targets
Self: 2 turns Special Effect [Syldra's Care]

While [Syldra's Care] is active
• Increases party's stolen BRV overflow limit by 20%
• Triggers [Whirlpool] after every enemy turn
　∟ 2-HIT Water ranged BRV attack (60% x2)
　∟ Increases allies' BRV by 100% BRV damage dealt
　∟ Cannot initiate [Chase] Sequence
　∟ Same special effect will not stack
desc.gl:
6-hit group Thunder Water Wind ranged BRV attack + group HP attack
Moderately increased BRV damage when attacking single target
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 2 turns special effect Syldra's Care

Slightly raises party's limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV, triggers Whirlpool (2-hit Water ranged BRV attack; grants allies BRV based on BRV damage dealt; no Knock Back) after enemy turn while special effect Syldra's Care active (does not stack with special effects of same name)
desc.jp:
6HIT雷水風属性全体遠距離物理BRV攻撃＋全体HP攻撃
攻撃対象が単体の時 与えるBRVダメージ中アップ
弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
与えるHPダメージは分配
自身に2ACTION特殊効果「シルドラの加護」付与

特殊効果「シルドラの加護」付与中
味方全員の奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する上限小アップし
敵の行動後 以下の「うずしお」が発動
2HIT水属性遠距離物理BRV攻撃
与えたBRVダメージに依存した量のBRVを
自身以外の味方全員に加算
この攻撃で吹きとばしは発生しない
（同名の特殊効果は重複しない）
「シルドラの加護」の効果

desc.en:
4-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack delivered twice
Increases BRV damage dealt by 50% when attacking debuffed targets
Stolen BRV can overflow up to 150% Max BRV
Deals 50% total HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack
All targets: 4 turns [Charming Dance]; framed 80% [Poison], 30% [MAX BRV Down], 70% [ATK Down], 70% [DEF Down]
desc.gl:
4-hit Thunder Water Wind melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times
Deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals 50% of cumulative HP damage to non-targets on last HP attack
All enemies: 4 turns Enchanting Dance; 4 turns silver-framed Poison, ATK Down III, DEF Down III, MAX BRV Down I
desc.jp:
4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行う
弱体効果が付与された対象に より大きなBRVダメージ
奪ったBRVを最大BRVを超えて加算する
上限は自身の最大BRVの150％分
最後のHP攻撃HIT時
ターゲット以外にも与えた合計HPダメージの50％分のHPダメージ
敵全体に4ACTION「魅了の舞」
銀フレーム付き弱体効果「毒」「攻撃力大ダウン」「防御力大ダウン」「最大BRV小ダウン」付与

desc.en:
Charming Dance:
• Lowers Thunder, Wind, Water resistance by 1
• Lowers BRV damage dealt by 20%
• Sets BRV to 0 when turn ends

name.jp: 華麗なる舞エクステンド

desc.en:
When using [Spell Blade: Sword Dance] 
• 2-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
　+ Increases own BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
　+ 4-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
　+ Increases own BRV by 20% total HP damage dealt
　+ 4-HIT Thunder Water Wind melee BRV + HP attack
• Increases total BRV potency by 160%
desc.gl:
When using Spellblade Sword Dance:
 • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind melee BRV attack + HP attack delivered 2 times becomes:
 • 2-hit Thunder Water Wind melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Increases BRV by 20% of HP damage dealt
 • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Increases BRV by 20% of cumulative HP damage dealt
 • 4-hit Thunder Water Wind melee BRV attack + HP attack
 • Tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
desc.jp:
「魔法剣つるぎのまい」使用時
・4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃を2回行うが
　2HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えたHPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　＋与えた合計HPダメージの20％分自身のBRVをアップ
　＋4HIT雷水風属性近距離物理BRV攻撃＋HP攻撃
　に変化し合計BRV威力も極大アップ

short_desc.gl: Grand Dance Extension: Boost to Spellblade Sword Dance
short_desc.jp: 華麗なる舞エクステンド：「魔法剣つるぎのまい」の性能アップ
